description: Local Governance and Decentralized Service Delivery Support Project

subproject.description: The Project builds on the first phase of the District Based Peace Building Project (DBPB) and the Community Based Peace Support Project (CBPS) in South Central Somalia with particular focus on implementing local peace building initiatives and strengthening the ability of local government and communities to respond to crisis and overcome the recovery challenges.
subproject.title: Local Governance & Decentraliz

subproject.description: The Joint Programme Programme Coordination Unit (PCU) is accountable to the Joint Programme Steering Committee, through the JPLG Programme Management Group for the results achieved under the Joint Programme.
